meanings.definition: A type of French pastry made from puff pastry dough and sugar, typically shaped like a palm leaf.
meanings.sent1: I bought some delicious palmiers from the bakery.
meanings.sent2: The palmiers at the party were a hit with everyone.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole a palmier and ran up the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a freshly baked palmier.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of palmiers baking in the oven filled the kitchen with warmth.

meanings.definition: A type of tropical tree with a straight trunk and large, fan-shaped leaves.
meanings.sent1: The palmiers in the park provided shade on hot days.
meanings.sent2: We admired the tall palmiers swaying gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys played hide-and-seek among the palmiers.
meanings.sent4: The palmiers stood like guardians of the forest, their leaves rustling softly.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a picture of the sunset behind the silhouette of palmiers.
